definition[0]: clearly different or belonging to a different type
example[2]: The learning needs of the two groups are quite distinct from each other.
definition[1]: something that is distinct can clearly be seen, heard, smelled etc
example[3]: The outline of the ship became more distinct.
definition[2]: a distinct possibility, feeling, quality etc definitely exists and cannot be ignored
example[4]: I got the distinct impression he was trying to make me angry.
example[5]: There is a distinct possibility that this will eventually be needed.
